constituent: example, person, file, bones, one, ceiling, evening, sword, sabre, saber
koohiiStory1: Mr T shows the example to the kids, and stays in the file (at supermarket, ...). “I pity da foo who does not follow my example !”.
koohiiStory2: When Mr. T. wants to make an example out of a group of people, he lines them up all single file and knocks them all out with one punch!
myStory: chữ lệ. ví dụ, lấy cái này làm mẫu. nhân + liệt. số nhiều người làm ví dụ.
words: example, even if, if, though, although
